text: Teodora Pentcheva (born 9 July 1982) is a Bulgarian snowboarder. She competed in the 2003, 2005, 2007, 2009, 2011 and 2017 FIS Snowboard World Championships, and in the 2018 Winter Olympics, in parallel giant slalom. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian female snowboarders Category:Olympic snowboarders of Bulgaria Category:Snowboarders at the 2018 Winter Olympics
title: Teodora Pentcheva
